# url

**Instance Property**

Indicates the URL of the page.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL? { get }
```

## Getting the Safari Page Properties

- **isActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the page is currently active.
- **title**: The title of the page.
- **usesPrivateBrowsing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the page is using Safari Private Browsing.
